analysis.description:
YiqiniuCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#242-270) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(address(this),TOTAL_SUPPLY_CAP) (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#250-251)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#251)

Reentrancy in YiqiniuCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#242-270):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(address(this),TOTAL_SUPPLY_CAP) (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#250-251)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#251)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- AgencyLock1 (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#254-256)
	- AgencyLock2 (/unique_chucks/22/0xd01a503337c3a8c86c0eb9b31e1d1f18a085d39d.sol#259-260)
